Name: Vulpix Tag
LongDescription: Slightly raises Defense and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Vulpix and Ninetales.  You can get a Vulpix Tag at the Croagunk Swap Shop if you offer a Vulpix Tail and a Vulpix Card. What will happen if you bring these three items together...?
